akn:section.akn:heading: Integrating Federal tourism assets to strengthen Native tourism opportunities

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Secretary of Commerce and Secretary of the Interior

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Secretary of Commerce and Secretary of the Interior The Secretary of Commerce and the Secretary of the Interior shall update the respective management plans and tourism initiatives of the Department of Commerce and the Department of the Interior to include Indian tribes, tribal organizations, and Native Hawaiian organizations.

(b) Other agencies The head of each agency that has recreational travel or tourism functions or complementary programs shall update the respective management plans and tourism strategies of the agency to include Indian tribes, tribal organizations, and Native Hawaiian organizations.
